column1: #--input file to parametrize the flexibility in the demand
#--uniform: boolean that determines if usage requires a uniform power or not
#--intermittent: boolean that determines if usage can be intermittent (stopped and restarted) or not

column2: number of timesteps usage is required

column1: #--E: total energy required for non-uniform usages only
column2: in kW.timestep (ie not multiplied by the duration of the timestep)

column1: #--Pmax: maximum power of usage for non-uniform usages only
#--i1: index of start of time window for usage (i1 included)
#--i2: index of end of time window for usage (i2 not included)
